content: What is the purpose of a constructor in Java?
What is the purpose of the 'static' keyword in Java?
answers: To access a variable or method without creating an object

content: What is the purpose of the 'final' keyword in Java?
answers: To access a variable or method without creating an object
To make a variable or method unchangeable

content: What is the purpose of the 'try-catch' block in Java?
answers: To access a variable or method without creating an object

content: What is the purpose of the 'public' keyword in Java?
answers: To access a variable or method without creating an object
To make a variable or method accessible from anywhere
